posts.description: Why Trump voters are not “complete idiots” – Chris Arnade – Medium
posts.extended: A common trope when trying to understand voters who vote differently from you is to simply call them idiots. This is particularly true this year, when discussing Trump voters. The most aggressive (and IMO offensive example of this) is by Jonathan Chait.

posts.description: What Donald Trump will have to accept: without journalism, there is no America | Media | The Guardian
posts.extended: How American journalists should organize and fight in such a climate is a long and uncertain discussion. But they will fight a losing battle without the trust and support of the American public
